thread.title: Karan Kundra Is Being Replaced On Roadies
thread.title_full: Karan Kundra Is Being Replaced On Roadies

author: Priyam Saha
title: Karan Kundra Is Being Replaced On Roadies
text:
Priyam Saha Feb . 21 . 2017 Karan Kundra 
Karan Kundra has been one of the gang leaders on Roadies for the past two seasons, but looks like he won’t be continuing his journey on this season anymore.The latest Roadies Rising promo saw Karan slapping an aspiring contestant , and when the news of Karan not being part of the show broke, it was believed that that was the reason he was asked to quit. However, the truth is that Kundra’s busy schedule isn’t allowing him to continue his Roadies journey. Nikhil Chinapa 
Nikhil Chinappa , MTV veteran, is being roped in to replace Karan. 
According to a report in PTI: 
Nikhil is being roped in to take Karan’s place on ‘Roadies Rising’ due to clash in schedules of the journey shoot and Karan’s other prior commitments. 
Will you miss Karan on the show? 5
